headline: LEYBOLD RUVAC ROOTS VACUUM PUMP
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Roots Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model WAU250
Pumping Speed 169.0 CFM (4,775.5 l/m)
Inlet Flange ASA 76.2 mm (3.000 in)
Foreline Flange ASA 76.2 mm (3.000 in)
Starting Pressure at Backing Pump Speed 50.00 torr (66.66 mbar, 66.66 Pa)
Max Pressure Difference for Cont Operation 60.00 torr (79.99 mbar, 79.99 Pa)
Oil Capacity Minimum: 0.47 L (0.50 qt, 0.10 Br gal) Maximum: 0.71 L (0.75 qt, 0.16 Br gal)
Motor Horsepower 1.5 HP
Rotational Speed 3,450 RPM
Power Requirements 230 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 32.500 in (82.6 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
